title: Can gold only be used in jewelry, are we sinful if we use them in plates, a tooth, weapons, electron
transcript:
[Questioner] from Germany yesterday I asked you 
about using gold and electronics but I didn't   explain myself a good so I work with gold in 
electronics so I use gold as a connection between   wires I read that Jumhoor of Scholars say that 
this is the accusing vessels of gold and silver   so say prohibit making use of gold in things 
other than jewelry so my question is is it   okay to use gold in working with electronics 
and is my money Halal from this the answer   is the same akhi the answer exactly the same 
as I said to you yesterday it's totally Halal   to work in it it's totally Halal to sell 
it and those Scholars who said that it's   not permissible to use gold and silver 
except in jewelry they're totally wrong   there's nothing wrong in using gold and silver in 
other than jewelry for example in making plates it   is prohibited to use and eat in Golden or silver 
utensils but there's nothing wrong in keeping them   as forms of decoration you have to pay his 
account of course there is no harm in using   little amount of gold in swords or in uh weapons 
of uh in arms that is with a certain degree when   needed if a person has the need to put a golden 
tooth in replacement for his uh teeth this is   permissible for necessity and it was mentioned by 
the jurors and the scholars in old times before uh   porcelain and and the likes that we use nowadays 
so there's no problem in that insha Allah and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
